attributes.action: Declare a Stamp Duty Holiday for properties upto £250,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A stamp duty hoilday upto £250,000will stimulate the property market by encourage buyers "sitting on the fence" to act now.  The government will also reeceive more stamp duty income than at present as the cheaper homes will complete the chains of the more expensive homes which fall in to the 3% and 4% bands.
